column5: Has anyone travelled the river into Abamasagi from Osullivans. I know abamasagi very well but maybe using Osullivans Outfitters and one of the routes of travel for them is the river in and out. Any experiences,good or bad are welcomed,thx

Not sure if this is the same route, but did you see this recent report from there??https://www.walleyecentral.com/forums...d.php?t=184223Not sure if they went down a river though, but looks like they may have for a part of the trip.

thx, I did see this and have spoken to Mike abt his trip. He though went into Aba a different route. Hard to believe nobody read this has gone into Aba via the river. Again, good or bad trips, info is welcomed. Im just curious.
Going on the 27th i'll find out if you can take the riverto aba, Can't wait for lots of great shore lunches
R U using Osullivans lake Outfitters?
hope your trip is a good one. any questions feel free to ask...been there a few times
